headline: Germany's Plans Are Big, But Not Big Enough, KKR's Vincent Policard Says
summary: The German cabinet has approved plans to spend 500B on infrastructure over the next 12 years, but KKR's Vincent Policard says it's not enough. KKR has invested billions in Germany over the past...
